get.summary: Returns a collection of geographical lines
get.description: Retrieves a collection of 30 geographical lines.

200.description: A successful response with a collection of geographical lines.

post.summary: Returns a limited number of geographical lines within a bounding box or GeoJSON polygon
post.description: Accepts a limit and optionally a GeoJSON Polygon or bounding box (bbox) to filter a collection of geographical lines. The limit must be less than or equal to 1000.

limit.description: Number of lines to return (must be <= 1000)

geojsonPolygon.description: GeoJSON Polygon to filter lines within

bbox.description: Bounding box in the format [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] to filter lines within

200.description: A successful response with a collection of geographical lines.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid limit value, GeoJSON Polygon, or BBox

message.example: Invalid input. Provide a valid limit number, GeoJSON Polygon, or bbox.
Error processing input. An internal error occurred

get.summary: Returns a collection of geographical lines with properties
get.description: Retrieves a collection of 30 geographical lines, each with associated properties.

200.description: A successful response with a collection of geographical lines and their properties.

properties.description: Additional properties associated with the line

description.example: This is a sample description for a line feature.

post.summary: Returns a limited number of geographical lines with properties within a bounding box or GeoJSON polygon
post.description: Accepts a limit and optionally a GeoJSON Polygon or bounding box (bbox) to filter a collection of geographical lines, with additional properties included. The limit must be less than or equal to 1000.

limit.description: Number of lines to return (must be <= 1000)

geojsonPolygon.description: GeoJSON Polygon to filter lines within

bbox.description: Bounding box in the format [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] to filter lines within

200.description: A successful response with a collection of geographical lines and their properties.

properties.description: Additional properties associated with the line

description.example: This is a sample description for a line feature.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid limit value, GeoJSON Polygon, or BBox

message.example: Invalid input. Provide a valid limit number, GeoJSON Polygon, or bbox.
Error processing input. An internal error occurred

get.summary: Returns a collection of random geographical multipolygons
get.description: Retrieves a collection of 30 random geographical multipolygons. Each multipolygon is generated randomly and adheres to basic geographical constraints.

geometry.description: The geometry object defining the multipolygon

coordinates.description: The coordinates defining the multipolygon geometry

error.example: An unexpected error occurred while generating multipolygons.

coordinates.description: The coordinates defining the multipolygon geometry

properties.description: Additional metadata associated with the multipolygon

id.description: A unique identifier for the multipolygon feature

area.description: The calculated area of the multipolygon in square kilometers

perimeter.description: The perimeter of the multipolygon in kilometers

error.example: An unexpected error occurred while generating multipolygons.

200.description: A successful response with a collection of random geographical multipolygons and their properties.

get.summary: Returns a collection of random geographical polygons
get.description: Retrieves a collection of 30 random geographical polygons. Each polygon is represented as a GeoJSON Feature with a geometry of type "Polygon". This endpoint does not require any input parameters and will generate random polygons that conform to valid GeoJSON standards. The polygons are randomly distributed within a predefined bounding area.

200.description: A successful response with a collection of random geographical polygons.

properties.description: Metadata associated with the polygon

description.example: A randomly generated polygon.

post.summary: Retrieve a limited number of random geographical polygons within a bounding box or GeoJSON polygon
post.description: This endpoint allows clients to retrieve a collection of random geographical polygons. The polygons are randomly distributed within a specified GeoJSON Polygon or bounding box. Clients can limit the number of polygons returned (up to a maximum of 1000). If no GeoJSON Polygon or bounding box is provided, the polygons will be generated within a default bounding area.

limit.description: Maximum number of polygons to return. Must be a positive integer less than or equal to 1000.

geojsonPolygon.description: A GeoJSON Polygon defining the area within which random polygons should be generated.

bbox.description: A bounding box in the format [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] to define the area for polygon generation.

200.description: A successful response with a collection of random geographical polygons.

features.description: Array of GeoJSON Feature objects, each representing a polygon.

properties.description: Metadata associated with the polygon

description.example: A randomly generated polygon within the specified area.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid input for `limit`, `geojsonPolygon`, or `bbox`.

message.example: Invalid input. Limit must be <= 1000, and geojsonPolygon or bbox must be valid.
An unexpected error occurred while generating polygons.

get.summary: Returns a collection of random geographical polygons with additional properties
get.description: Retrieves a collection of 30 random geographical polygons. Each polygon is represented as a GeoJSON Feature with a geometry of type "Polygon" and includes additional metadata properties. This endpoint does not require any input parameters and will generate random polygons and associated properties, ensuring valid GeoJSON standards are maintained. The polygons are randomly distributed within a predefined bounding area.

200.description: A successful response with a collection of random geographical polygons and their properties.

properties.description: Metadata associated with the polygon

description.example: A randomly generated polygon with associated metadata.

area.description: The calculated area of the polygon

perimeter.description: The calculated perimeter of the polygon

post.summary: Retrieve a limited number of random geographical polygons with additional metadata within a bounding box or GeoJSON polygon
post.description: This endpoint retrieves a collection of random geographical polygons along with additional properties. The polygons are randomly distributed within a specified GeoJSON Polygon or bounding box. Clients can limit the number of polygons returned (up to a maximum of 1000). If no GeoJSON Polygon or bounding box is provided, the polygons will be generated within a default bounding area.

limit.description: Maximum number of polygons to return. Must be a positive integer less than or equal to 1000.

geojsonPolygon.description: A GeoJSON Polygon defining the area within which random polygons should be generated.

bbox.description: A bounding box in the format [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] to define the area for polygon generation.

200.description: A successful response with a collection of random geographical polygons and their properties.

features.description: Array of GeoJSON Feature objects, each representing a polygon with additional properties.

properties.description: Metadata associated with the polygon

description.example: A randomly generated polygon within the specified area.

area.description: The area of the polygon in square kilometers.

perimeter.description: The perimeter of the polygon in kilometers.

random_property.description: A randomly assigned property for the polygon.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid input for `limit`, `geojsonPolygon`, or `bbox`.

message.example: Invalid input. Limit must be <= 1000, and geojsonPolygon or bbox must be valid.
An unexpected error occurred while generating polygons.
